title: Scent of the Wolf
description: Sophia Miller has no idea she's descended from werewolves until after her grandfather dies. From the time she and her cousin, Karl, arrive at the old European castle to hear his will, she is plagued by frightening dreams. She intends to collect her inheritance and return to London as soon as possible. Her plans change, however, when she and Karl learn they must remain in their grandfather's home for a month or the will is void. Matters are further complicated when another benefactor is named. Peter Krieg, a dark, mysterious stranger, awakens feelings Sophia never imagined...or feared.
author: Tracey DeVore
